### Explanation

When flying to Paris, budget airlines such as easyJet and Vueling are your best friend.
EasyJet allows you to be highly flexible and offers double the amount of flights Air France does!

August is the best time to fly to Paris as the flights are on average significantly cheaper.
Knowing this information, you will think twice about using the Eurostar, as Eurostar return tickets are much more expensive averaging 250 pounds.
